roleset.name: make or become worse

example.name: agentive but perhaps not grammatical
example.text: John worsened his breath by chewing garlic-flavored gum.

example.name: agentive? Instrumental?
example.text: The buy-out effort also worsened already-strained relations between United's pilot and machinist unions.
example.arg: already-strained relations between United's pilot and machinist unions

example.name: definitely instrumental
example.text: Yesterday, Armstrong reported [flat earnings for the third quarter and nine months]-1, worsened *trace*-1 by the stock dilution of an employee stock ownership plan adopted earlier this year.
example.arg: by the stock dilution of an employee stock ownership plan adopted earlier this year

example.name: ergative
example.text: Gasoline margins may rebound this quarter, some industry officials say, but they believe chemical margins could worsen.

roleset.note: Based on financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry other_cos-45.4. Comparison with 'improve'.
